column5: Good Vid of Dave and Ray Scott  http://www.wired2fish.com/Media1147/Scott-and-Mercer-Chat-about-BASS.aspx  Ray has some well deserved kind words for Dave at the end.
Good for ya Dave !!!!!!!!!!! One thing i like about Dave is his sincerity.If you look, he always makes eye contact with the people he is talking to.That tells all !!!!!!!!!
Dave is absolutely a CLASS act!  The best ambassador Canada could have. Good things come to good people.
Wow, what an honour! Coming from the Bass Boss himself is quite a compliment!
